testsuite.name: Buffer Service Implementation Tests

testcase.name: Delete buffers by connection scheme - Positive
Create buffer - Negative: Token validation fails
Get buffers by connection scheme - Positive
Create buffer - Negative: Connection scheme doesn't belong to client
Create buffer - Negative: Buffer already exists
